title: Hear from people living with hepatitis B
description: A national nonprofit dedicated to finding a cure and improving the quality of life for people affected by hepatitis B worldwide
cleaned_text: The Hepatitis B Foundation is an official charity partner of the TCS New York City Marathon. Support our #Run4HepB team, donate today! A national nonprofit dedicated to finding a cure and improving the quality of life for people affected by hepatitis B worldwide The Hepatitis B Foundation is working on every front to improve the lives of people living with hepatitis B.
